Summary Note:
The RM first met Alexandra De Smet at a wine tasting event in Madrid. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
With a career spanning nearly 40 years, Alexandra De Smet has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Alexandra De Smet and Peiren tied the knot in 1996. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1979, Alexandra graduated from Heilige Familiecollege with a secondary school diploma.
Alexandra completed her university studies at Vrije Universiteit Brussel in 1985.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 40 years, Alexandra De Smet has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Alexandra De Smet began her professional journey as a Drilling Engineer at Enagás S.A. in 1985, laying the foundation for future success.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Reservoir Engineer at Cepsa Trading S.A.U. in 1989, further expanding her skill set.
She spent 2 years working as a Operations Manager at Enagás S.A., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
She worked as a VP of Exploration at Enagás S.A. from 1996 to 2001, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Alexandra De Smet retired after holding the position of CEO at Gas Natural Fenosa S.A. from 2003 to 2021.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1660000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 2370000 EUR.

She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Alexandra as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
